results.name: n-th prime in the arithmetic progression n+k*(n+1) with k>0.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Dirichlet's Theorem
Index entries for sequences related to primes in arithmetic progressions
mathematica: Table[k = 1; Do[While[p = n + k*(n + 1); ! PrimeQ[p], k++]; k++, {n}]; p, {n, 100}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Oct 20 2011 *)
